name: British Airways Business Class - Club Europe, Airbus A319, Jersey to London Gatwick
description:
This is the shortest Club Europe flight around! Here, I fly between Jersey and London Gatwick. A little under 35 minutes in the air thanks to a fair tailwind up the Channel. I'm still amazed they can serve drinks, a salad lunch, and another drink before landing.

(Note: the video is quite a few months old, and the "temporary" lounge in the video is no more. The proper lounge has finished its refurbishment)

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
